name: Hamster Lander
description:
In Hamster Lander you are a hamster who got lost in space. The goal is to find the space bases to be rescued .

Credits: Programmer:
  • Lucas Pich
Artists:
  • Martina Angelico Engelhardt
  • Olivia Fainberg Rocchi
Music:
  • onky (https://opengameart.org/content/deep-space)
  • Gundatsch (https://opengameart.org/content/idiots-in-space)
